attributes.action: reflect the fact that persons driving unlicensed and/or uninsured should not be driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand the law to reflect the fact that persons causing death while driving unlicensed and/or uninsured should simply not be driving. Therefore we require this offense to be considered a criminal act and offenders to be charged with manslaughter.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reflect the fact that persons driving unlicensed and/or uninsured should not be driving.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=patterson


Her Majesty's Government
